steps.title: Compliance in 4 Steps
steps.description: Our streamlined approach to making compliance simple, efficient, and reliable.

step1.title: Automate compliance with Quantifier's AI Agent
step1.description: Let our AI handle your compliance processes from data collection to reporting.

step2.title: Centralize all regulatory requirements
step2.description: Keep all your compliance requirements in one accessible location.

step3.title: Track & Report with a real-time dashboard
step3.description: Monitor your compliance status with intuitive visualizations and reports.

step4.title: Stay Ahead with continuous compliance updates
step4.description: Receive automated updates when regulations change that affect your business.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: Quantifier delivers a complete compliance management solution with these powerful benefits.

continuousCompliance.title: Continuous Compliance
continuousCompliance.description: No more firefighting. Stay compliant at all times with proactive monitoring.

aiPoweredRegulatory.title: AI-Powered Regulatory Assistant
aiPoweredRegulatory.description: Our AI knows what you need before you do, anticipating regulatory requirements.

seamlessIntegrations.title: Seamless Integrations
seamlessIntegrations.description: Works with your existing ERP, HR, Excel and other business systems.

automatedReports.title: Automated Reports
automatedReports.description: Generate ready-to-submit reports that meet auditor's & regulatory requirements.

realTimeDashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
realTimeDashboard.description: Always know where you stand with intuitive visualizations of your compliance status.

whyQuantifier.reimaginedCompliance: We've reimagined compliance, delivering a solution that eliminates manual processes, automates data collection, and gives you confidence in meeting all regulatory requirements.
whyQuantifier.joinForward: Join forward-thinking companies using Quantifier to transform their compliance processes.
whyQuantifier.weWillGetBack: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
whyQuantifier.completeAiOfficerDesc: Your personal AI compliance officer that handles all aspects of compliance management.
whyQuantifier.dataCollectionDesc: Our AI agent automatically collects and organizes compliance data from across your organization.
whyQuantifier.projectManagementDesc: Track progress, assign tasks, and monitor deadlines for all compliance projects.
whyQuantifier.resultVisualizationDesc: Clear dashboards and reports that showcase your compliance status to stakeholders.
whyQuantifier.aiNativeDesc: Built from the ground up with AI at its core, not just as an add-on feature.
whyQuantifier.modularDesc: Implement only what you need with our flexible, modular architecture.
whyQuantifier.simpleDesc: No complex training required. Start using Quantifier with minimal onboarding.
whyQuantifier.savesTimeDesc: Reduce time spent on compliance tasks by up to 70% through smart automation.
